price: 25. Haddaad (gaalada) weydiiso: Yaa abuuray samooyinka iyo arlada? Waxay odhan: Allaah. Dheh: Ammaan idilkeed iyo mahad waxaa leh Alle. Badankooduse ma oga.
arabic: وَلَئِن سَأَلۡتَهُم مَّنۡ خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ لَيَقُولُنَّ ٱللَّهُۚ قُلِ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِۚ بَلۡ أَكۡثَرُهُمۡ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wala-in sa-altahum man khalaqa al-samāwāti wal-arḍa layaqūlunna al-lahu quli al-ḥamdu lillahi bal aktharuhum lā yaʿlamūna
